Uses of Class
alix.lucene.search.FieldFacet

  • Packages that use FieldFacet 
    Package Description
    alix.lucene
    Main pilots for indexing and searching, see especially Alix
    alix.lucene.search
    Objects to search and calculate lexical statistics from an index (ex: found occurrences by facet)

    • Uses of FieldFacet in alix.lucene

      Methods in alix.lucene that return FieldFacet 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      FieldFacet Alix.fieldFacet​(String facetField, String textField)
      See Alix.fieldFacet(String, String, Term)
      FieldFacet Alix.fieldFacet​(String facetField, String textField, org.apache.lucene.index.Term coverTerm)
      Get a “facet” object, a cached list of terms from a field of type SortedDocValuesField or SortedSetDocValuesField ; to get lexical stats from a text field.

    • Uses of FieldFacet in alix.lucene.search

      Constructors in alix.lucene.search with parameters of type FieldFacet 
      Constructor Description
      FormEnum​(FieldFacet field, int[] terms)
      Build an iterator from a facet field with an ordered arrays of formId
